mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectGodItmHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ ITM_NO , ITM_HIST_TURN , GOD_NO , SKU_NO , ITM_STAT_CD , ITM_NM , OPT_CD_1 , OPT_NM_1 , OPT_VAL_CD_1 , OPT_VAL_NM_1 , OPT_CD_2 , OPT_NM_2 , OPT_VAL_CD_2 , OPT_VAL_NM_2 , OPT_CD_3 , OPT_NM_3 , OPT_VAL_CD_3 , OPT_VAL_NM_3 , OPT_CD_4 , OPT_NM_4 , OPT_VAL_CD_4 , OPT_VAL_NM_4 , OPT_CD_5 , OPT_NM_5 , OPT_VAL_CD_5 , OPT_VAL_NM_5 , TOT_USEFUL_INV_QTY , SALE_PREARNGE_QTY , SAFE_INV_USE_YN , SAFE_INV_QTY , ONLNE_LMTT_INV_QTY , AFF_COM_LMTT_INV_QTY , RESVE_QTY , RESVE_INV_QTY , PARTMAL_COM_INV_NTCN_YN , PARTMAL_COM_INV_NTCN_QTY , WRHS_DT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM GOD_ITM_HIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND ITM_NO = #{itmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ITM_HIST_TURN = #{itmHistTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
